title: Quickly Access College Basketball Data
text: functions take seasons argument seasons query. Data typically available 2003 present season, error thrown data available specified season. Calling functions -load data recent (current) college basketball season. return available seasons given resource, just pass TRUE argument function. functions load resources specified year, thus take argument.
code: library(cbbreadr) # with no argument, returns most recent season load_games() # specify a single season load_games(2023) # specify a range of seasons load_games(2010:2015) # return all available seasons load_games(TRUE) # does not take any arguments load_conferences()

title: Quickly Access College Basketball Data
text: package possible thanks CollegeBasketballData.com API. API maintained Bill Radjewski, kind enough make data available free. API premium tiers maintaining package requires free tier, money needed upkeep package. like support package, rather send money way, encourage instead donate subscribe Bill’s Patreon can continue developing maintaining wonderful project. developer nflverse organization years now, learned much talented teammates (contributed cbbreadr’s development, either directly indirectly). structure code project looks quite similar NFL pipelines good reason, project possible without expertise. thanks goes entire nflverse organization.

title: Quickly Access College Basketball Data
text: cbbreadr relies several automated pipelines GitHub keep data resources updated. largely static data objects (load_conferences()), pipelines run year. frequently updated data objects (load_plays()), pipelines run daily college basketball season. view data resource recently updated, see .

what: Load college basketball games for specified season(s) — load_games
title: Load college basketball games for specified season(s) — load_games
text: Pull college basketball games tracked collegebasketballdata.com Returns data NCAA D1 men's basketball games specified seasons. Includes contextual information, game took place , well high level box score data, scores team. return games past scheduled games. game scheduled opponents yet determined (.e., national championship game upcoming season), appear dataset.

text: Pull statistics aggregated player game specified season(s) data includes traditional box score stats (points, OREB, AST) well advanced stats (USG%, ORTG). information stat, see data dictionary dictionary_player_box_scores.

Load cbb player box score stats — load_player_box_scores

text: Pull statistics aggregated team game specified season(s) data includes traditional box score stats (points, OREB, AST) well advanced stats (ORTG, OREB%). information stat, see data dictionary dictionary_player_box_scores.

title: Load cbb team box score stats — load_team_box_scores
Load cbb team box score stats — load_team_box_scores
text: seasons integer vector integers seasons fetch data . Defaults recent season. Pass TRUE fetch seasons.
